articles.description: Follow live text, in-play video clips and radio commentary as India play Bangladesh in the Men's Cricket World Cup 2023.
articles.title: World Cup: India v Bangladesh - clips, radio & text

articles.description: All the latest football news and transfer gossip, plus Women's Champions League reaction and Premier League build-up.
articles.title: Football latest - Tonali, Neymar, Women's Champions League

articles.description: Freddie Steward, Joe Marler and George Martin come into the England side to take on South Africa in the Rugby World Cup semi-final on Saturday.
articles.title: Steward, Marler & Martin in for England semi-final

articles.description: Three-time Wimbledon champion Boris Becker says he is the new coach of Denmark's world number six Holger Rune.
articles.title: Becker to return to tennis with Rune coaching role

articles.description: Gary Lineker, Alan Shearer and Micah Richards discuss the best Premier League goals scored by defenders.
articles.title: 'Please say you've put yourself at number one!'

articles.description: South Africa name an unchanged side to face England in their World Cup semi-final in Paris on Saturday.
articles.title: South Africa name unchanged side to face England

articles.description: Frankie Dettori has several winning hopes as he bows out from British racing at Ascot on Saturday.
articles.title: Ascot set for Dettori's British farewell

articles.description: Argentina head coach Michael Cheika is aiming to reach his second Rugby World Cup final and the first in the Pumas' history.
articles.title: Can Cheika 'conquer Everest' again to lead Pumas to final?

articles.description: Six England players are retained by their franchises for the second season of the Women's Premier League in India.
articles.title: Six England players retained by WPL franchises

articles.description: Billie Jean King says she would happily see the cup competition bearing her name combined with the Davis Cup into one World Cup of tennis.
articles.title: King wants combined men's & women's tennis World Cup
